Title: Get All Products - Basic Request
Precondition: API server is running on localhost:8091
Test Steps: 1. Send GET request to /products 2. Verify response contains product array 3. Check response structure
Expected Result: Status: 200; Response contains data array with product objects
Actual Result: Status: 200; Response contains data array with products and pagination info

Title: Get Products with Page Parameter
Precondition: API server is running on localhost:8091
Test Steps: 1. Send GET request to /products?page=1 2. Verify response contains correct pagination info
Expected Result: Status: 200; Response contains current_page=1 and pagination metadata
Actual Result: Status: 200; Response contains current_page=1 and pagination info

Title: Get Products with Category Filter
Precondition: API server is running on localhost:8091
Test Steps: 1. Send GET request to /products?by_category=1 2. Verify filtered results
Expected Result: Status: 200; Response contains products filtered by category ID 1

Precondition: API server is running on localhost:8091

Title: Search Products with Query

Title: Filter Rental Products

Title: Get Products with Invalid Category
Test case name/Objective: Verify handling of invalid category ID
Precondition: API server is running on localhost:8091
Test Steps: 1. Send GET request to /products?by_category=999 2. Verify error handling
Expected Result: Status: 404 or empty results with 200; Proper error handling
Remark: Server error instead of proper error handling
